summary: Comprehensive testing of Faberlic Mining platform completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 94.1% success rate (16/17 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all major pages working with perfect Azerbaijani language implementation, premium white/gold theme, and mobile responsive design. Backend-frontend integration working flawlessly with real-time data updates.

minor_issues.issue: Withdrawal test failed due to insufficient balance (expected behavior)
minor_issues.impact: No impact - this is correct validation behavior
minor_issues.note: User balance was less than minimum 250 USDT requirement

passed_tests: VIP levels system (5 levels properly configured)
Order system with QR codes and cashback
Mining system (500 taps every 6 hours, 0.01 USDT per tap)
Daily spin wheel with rewards (0.5-20 USDT)
